nodes.documentation:
This contract will create all the functionalities related to a store.

 * For example
- Adding a product
- updating a product
- customer being able to view the list of stores
- store owner being able to see the stores
- customer being able to view the products in a given Store
nodes.name: Store

nodes.documentation: Since this contract needs to accept ether, declare an anonymous payable function.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only a store owner can invoke this function!"

arguments.value: Only a store owner can invoke this function!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only a store owner can invoke this function!"

nodes.documentation: Only (store) owners shall be allowed to add or update the store specific details - e.g. product.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: A function to return the state details for a given store contract
nodes.name: getStoreDetails

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
A store owner will use this function to add a new product to his / her store.

     * Whenever a new product is added, the product map will be updated to hold all the product and their details
across all the store and store owners.
nodes.name: addProductToTheStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
literal_string "Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!"

arguments.value: Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Product for the given store id and product id combination does not exist!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
The update product function will be called to update the details of an existing function.

     * In a regular course of a business, the following amounts may get updated.
- quantity
- productName
- price
- description
nodes.name: updateProduct

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
literal_string "Only the active product can be be removed from the store!"

arguments.value: Only the active product can be be removed from the store!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the active product can be be removed from the store!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
A store owner can decide to remove a product from his/her store.
A removed product will not be visible to shoppers!
nodes.name: removeProduct

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

arguments.value: Only the Inactive product can be activated!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the Inactive product can be activated!"

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:

A removed product will not be visible to shoppers!
